name.baseName: Remediated soil ; In-situ S/S ; cement, bentonite ; Soil in-situ remediation ; 5 months
修复后土壤;原位固化稳定化;水泥、膨润土;土壤原位修复;5个月

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: In-situ (S/S), involves use of cement and bentonite as binders to solidify and stabilize the contaminated soil. On-site mixing machinery — auger/caisson system was assumed to be used. The amount of binders required for the treatment was estimated from available reports on actual site applications. The transportation distances for suppliers, landfill and clean-fill source were assumed to be 75 km. An average time of operation, 5 months (US EPA, 2000).
原位固化稳定化，包括使用水泥和膨润土作为粘合剂来固化和稳定受污染的土壤。假设使用现场搅拌机械——螺旋钻/沉箱系统。处理所需的粘合剂量是根据实际场地的报告中的数据。供应商、垃圾填埋场和清洁填料来源的运输距离假定为75公里。处理的平均运行时间假定为5个月（US EPA, 2000）。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is defined as remediation of 5000 yd 3 of soil. The design of the treatment options is generic, and lacks parameters such as site characteristics, hydrology and efficiency of technology.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: This study used a hypothetical site and did not specify the location of the site, therefore the author's area was used as the site location: Newark, the United States
本研究使用的是一个假设的场地，且没有明确场地所在位置，因此采用作者所在的区域作为场地位置，即美国Newark

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Auger; Tipper truck (40 t); Treatment time: 5 months; 8 workers/d. The ransportation distance from the site to suppliers was assumed to be 75km.
原位固化稳定化需要钻机一台，40t自卸车一辆；处理时间5个月，需要工人8人/天。假设场地到供应商的运输距离均为75公里。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process described is an in-situ solidification and stabilization (S/S) remediation technique used for treating contaminated soil with cement and bentonite as binding agents. This method, suitable for application at hypothetical sites similar to the one assumed in Newark, USA, is used to remediate soils using on-site mixing machinery such as an auger/caisson system. The process is designed to be generic and could potentially be utilized in a range of soil remediation projects lacking detailed site-specific characteristics, hydrology, and technical efficiencies.
所描述的工业过程是一种原位固化和稳定化（S/S）修复技术，使用水泥和膨润土作为结合剂来处理受污染的土壤。这个方法适用于与假设中的美国纽瓦克类似的假设场所，用于使用现场搅拌机械如螺旋钻/沉箱系统进行土壤修复。该过程旨在通用，可能适用于缺乏详细场地特定特征、水文和技术效率的多种土壤修复项目。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Dhaliwal, Harnoor, "Sustainable site remediation : a life cycle assessment approach" (2009). Theses. 296.
Dhaliwal, Harnoor, "Sustainable site remediation : a life cycle assessment approach" (2009). Theses. 296.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: For users of this LCA data set, it is recommended to apply it to similar in-situ S/S soil remediation scenarios, factoring in adjustments for specific site conditions and transport distances. It is important to note that the assumed operational time is based on a 5-month period with 8 workers per day, and all transport distances for supplies are standardized at 75km, which might not reflect actual distances in future applications. Users should ensure the congruency of these assumptions with their specific case. Additionally, users should consider expanding the scope of the LCA to encompass any site-specific characteristics, hydrological conditions, and technological efficiencies not covered within this generic data set.

对于这个生命周期评估数据集的用户，建议将其应用于类似的原位S/S土壤修复场景，并根据具体场地条件和运输距离进行调整。重要的是要注意，假设的运营时间是基于5个月时间，每天8名工人，并且所有供应品的运输距离标准化为75公里，这可能不反映未来应用中的实际距离。用户应确保这些假设与特定案例的一致性。此外，用户应考虑扩大生命周期评估的范围，以包含任何未在这个通用数据集中涵盖的场地特定特征、水文条件和技术效率。

completeness.common:other: Transportation of material and equipment was included in the site preparation stage; material and electricity was used during the treatment stage and finally transportation was considered again during site dismantling to return the equipment to its original location.
材料和设备的运输包括在现场准备阶段；在处理阶段使用了材料和电力，最后在现场拆卸过程中再次考虑运输，将设备送回原位。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 运输总距离为5550km，自卸车载重40吨
功能单元定义为5000 yd 3土壤的修复（1yd3等于0.764554857984立方米,即修复方量约为3822.77 m3）。
